title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Product name: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte.

This is an eyeshadow in stick format. The shade is Putty Matte, a light taupe-pink color. The finish is matte. The formula goes on like a soft crème and then sets to a powder. It is highly pigmented, so color shows well with one or two swipes.

Key features:
- Waterproof and crease-proof for long wear.
- Suitable for delicate, sensitive skin.
- Includes vitamins C and E and candelilla wax.
- Provides hydration and nourishment with antioxidant protection.
- Helps improve look of skin tone and texture over time.
- No extra brush needed; built-in smudger on the other end.

How to use:
- Twist up a small amount of stick.
- Sweep the stick directly on eyelid.
- You can coat the smudger with color if you prefer to blend from the smudger.
- Blend with the built-in smudger or your fingertip.
- Please blend before the formula sets.
- Wear alone for simple matte look, or layer with other shades. Available in Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes across about 30 shades.

This product is made for easy, quick application. It is travel-friendly, does not require separate tools, and stays in place during the day. Suitable for everyday use and comfortable on skin. Color: Putty Matte. Finish: Matte. Type: Crème-to-powder eyeshadow stick. Waterproof and crease-proof, with gentle ingredients and a convenient smudger included.
